name: Rolling Girl: A Visual Novel
description:
Trigger Warnings for content relating to depression, self hatred, and implied suicide. Rolling Girl isn't a happy song.

This is my first complete (?) visual novel. I created it in about a week and a half for a school project, so it's not as cleaned up as I would have liked, but I learned a lot while creating it and it has helped me deal with the passing of the original song's creator, who's works were very important to my adolescence.
